title: Patch Notes
content: om giving Advantage for rogues' Sneak Attack. Fixed an issue causing Tempest Domain clerics' Channel Divinity to not deal maximum damage for some spells like Shocking Grasp. You can no longer open locked containers through trade as if they weren't locked. Fixed a bug preventing you from looting mounds you dig up if you started a dialogue during the digging animation. Fixed some flickering shader artefacts that were appearing on, for example, Karlach's tent and Justiciar Crusaders in Umbral Form.
